scripts.build:fonts: bun run ./packages/build-tools/generateFonts.ts && fantasticon -n mni -p mni ./packages/build-tools/fontIcons -o ./packages/static/fonts && rm -r ./packages/build-tools/fontIcons
scripts.build:icons: bun run build:icons-react && bun run build:icons-vue && bun run build:icons-vue-latest
